member.name: T:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations
member.summary: This class encapsulates and represent all informations about a client's configuration. If you want to configure the client's No, the client's name, The client organization's name or anything related to the client, this is the class you need to use.
member.remarks: This class is mainly use with the class CJacoConfigurationManager via the CJacoArm.ConfigurationsManager.GetClientConfigurations method and the CJacoArm.ConfigurationsManager.SetClientConfigurations method.

member.summary: Quantity of retrated position. This value is used during the defining of the forward retracted position.

member.summary: The client's number

member.summary: The client's name.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_Organization
member.summary: The client's organization name.

member.summary: The robot's serial number.

member.summary: The robot's model number.

member.summary: The robot's laterality (Left or right handed).

member.summary: The cartesian linear's max speed in meter per second.

member.summary: This is the rotation speed when the orientation of the hand is moved. Units are Rad per sec.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_MaxLinearAcceleration
member.summary: The cartesian linear's max acceleration in meter per second squared.(Not activated in the actual version)

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_MaxAngularAcceleration
member.summary: The angular's max acceleration in meter per second squared.(Not activated in the actual version)

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_MaxForce
member.summary: The max cartesian force that the robot can apply in newton.(Not activated in the actual version)

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_Sensibility
member.summary: The sensibility's rate (percentage).

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_DrinkingHeight
member.summary: The drinking height in meter. The drinking height is the vertical distance between the joint #5 and the middle of the hand.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_DrinkingDistance
member.summary: The drinking distance in meter. The drinking distance is the horizontal distance between the joint #5 and the middle hand.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_ComplexRetractActive
member.summary: A flag that indicate if the Complex retracted mode is active or not.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_AngleRetractedPosition
member.summary: The angle while the arm is in retracted position wich is the angle between the joint #2's horizontal axe and the joint #2 to joint #3's axe.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_RetractPositions
member.summary: A list of positions of each joint when the robot is in retracted position.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_Fingers2and3inverted
member.summary: A flag that indicate if the fingers 2 and 3 are inverted

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_DrinkingLength
member.summary: The drinking length in meter. This is the distance, along the last axis, of the rotation center when the robot is in drinking mode. A length of 0 indicates the center of the hand.

member.name: F:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.m_DeletePreProgrammedPositionsAtRetract
member.summary: A flag that indicates if the complex READY position is active.

member.summary: A buffer that should not be use. It's only purpose is for the data's synchronisation during the serialization/deserialization.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the , Initialize all communication and call the method.

member.summary: Initialize this instance and put a valid value in all its fields;

member.name: M:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.ClientConfigurationInit
member.summary: Initialize the client's configuration and all it's member.
member.remarks: This method is public to lets other classes initializes the client's configuration

member.name: M:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.IsEqual(Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified other configurations is equal. The equality is based on these member : Laterality, MaxLinearSpeed, MaxAngularSpeed, MaxLinearAcceleration, MaxAngularAcceleration, MaxForce, Sensibility, AngleRetractedPosition, DrinkingHeight, DrinkingDistance. If all of them are equal, the method return true.
member.param: The other configurations to be compared.
member.returns: true if the specified other configurations is equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.IsValid
member.summary: A validation check for the client configuration's value. It checks if all the value are between the threshold setted by the class.

member.name: P:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CClientConfigurations.ClientNo

member.name: T:Kinova.DLL.Data.Jaco.Config.CZoneLimitation
member.summary: This serializable class encapsulate and represent informations about the limitation of a zone. Note that in angular mode, some member of the class change. LinearSpeed = Speed of the first 3 joints, AngularSpeed = Speed of the 3 last joints, linear force = force of the 3 first joints and Anglar force = force of the 3 last joints. Acceleration is not yet supported.
